STEAL.OFFER:
üî™ **Steal or no steal?**

You notice that the members with the **most ingots** are particularly distracted...

BACKROOMS.INTRO:
‚ö†Ô∏è **You clip through reality and fall into the backrooms...**

Endless yellow hallways stretch before you. Fluorescent lights hum overhead.

Three corridors beckon - one holds forgotten treasure, another hides a lurking entity, and the third... might lead you out.

Choose your path carefully.

‚è≥ You must decide {expires}.
TREASURE_MESSAGES:
üí∞ **Supply cache discovered!**

You find an abandoned backpack stuffed with **{ingots}** ingots!

Someone else's loss is your gain.

üéâ **Emergency stash!**

Behind a loose wall panel, you discover a survival cache containing **{ingots}** ingots!

Previous wanderers weren't so lucky.

‚ú® **Lost valuables!**

Scattered across the floor are **{ingots}** ingots, dropped by someone who fled in panic.

You pocket them quickly.

üèÜ **Hidden supplies!**

You stumble upon a forgotten storage room with **{ingots}** ingots!

It's been here for who knows how long...

üíé **Reality glitch!**

The backrooms flicker and **{ingots}** ingots materialize from thin air!

The laws of physics don't apply here.

üéÅ **Lucky corridor!**

This hallway leads to an office desk with **{ingots}** ingots in the drawer!

At least someone was organized.

‚ö±Ô∏è **Abandoned loot!**

You find evidence of another explorer's camp... and their **{ingots}** ingots!

They won't be needing these anymore.

üåü **Exit gift!**

A mysterious figure appears, hands you **{ingots}** ingots, and vanishes into the walls.

Was that real?
MONSTER_MESSAGES:
üëÅÔ∏è **The Smiler found you!**

A grinning entity emerges from the shadows! You run in terror!

**{ingots}** ingots!

Those eyes... those teeth... never look back.

üêï **Hound attack!**

A deformed creature on all fours chases you down the corridor!

**{ingots}** ingots!

You can still hear it howling in the distance...

üë§ **Skin-stealer!**

Something wearing a human face lunges at you! You flee!

**{ingots}** ingots!

It almost looked like someone you knew...

‚ö° **Reality shift!**

The walls suddenly close in! You escape desperately!

**{ingots}** ingots!

The backrooms don't follow the rules of physics.

üåÄ **Lost in the maze!**

You run through infinite identical hallways!

**{ingots}** ingots!

Every turn looks the same... are you going in circles?

üë• **Faceling swarm!**

Humanoid figures with blank faces surround you! You break through!

**{ingots}** ingots!

They moved so unnaturally...

üíÄ **The Entity!**

Something ancient and wrong manifests before you! You sprint away!

**{ingots}** ingots!

You're not supposed to be here.

üîä **Sound trap!**

Deafening static fills the air! You stumble, disoriented!

**{ingots}** ingots!

The fluorescent lights buzz louder and louder...
ESCAPE_MESSAGES:
üö™ **Found the exit!**

The corridor leads to a glowing portal back to reality! You noclip through.

No ingots gained or lost, but you made it out alive!

üò∞ **Safe passage!**

You hear buzzing in the next room and decide to turn back. Smart choice.

Your ingots remain intact.

üî¶ **Empty level!**

Just an abandoned office space. No entities, no loot. You backtrack carefully.

Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

üõó **Elevator escape!**

You find a working elevator that takes you back up! You're free!

Sometimes the boring choice is the safe one.

üè¢ **Safe room discovered!**

This room is marked with survivor graffiti: "SAFE". You rest and retreat.

You leave the way you came, unscathed.

üöß **Maintenance exit!**

A service ladder leads back to your world! You climb out quickly.

Live to explore another day!

üëÄ **Close call!**

You sense something watching from the shadows. You back away slowly.

Discretion kept you safe.

üå´Ô∏è **Liminal space!**

The hallway stretches infinitely with no end. You decide not to risk getting lost.

Your ingots remain safe.
LUCKY_ESCAPE_MESSAGES:
üçÄ **Entity ignored you!**

The Smiler reaches for your pockets... but they're empty!

It loses interest and disappears into the walls. Being broke saved you!

üòÖ **Too poor to hunt!**

The entity searches you for valuables... and finds nothing.

It leaves in disappointment. Poverty is protection in the backrooms!

üé≠ **Not worth the effort!**

The creature demands your belongings, but you have nothing!

It scoffs and phases through the floor. Rock bottom has its perks!

ü§∑ **Nothing to take!**

The Hound corners you and searches your pockets... completely empty!

It gives you a pitying growl and wanders off.

üòÇ **Joke's on them!**

The Faceling tries to steal from you, but you're already broke!

It tilts its blank face in confusion and vanishes.

üí∏ **Already empty!**

The entity shakes you down for loot... finding absolutely nothing.

Disgusted, it tosses you aside and leaves. Being poor saved your life!
BACKROOMS.OPENING_DOOR:
üö™ **Entering the {door}...**

_The fluorescent lights hum overhead as you step inside..._
BACKROOMS.EXPIRED:
‚è±Ô∏è **The walls shift!**

You took too long to decide. The backrooms consume your hesitation.

The corridors rearrange and your chance is lost.
